trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controlo de editor que permite aos utilizadores finais editar várias propriedades de interface (IU) do utilizador num associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de BehaviorEditorPart é um controlo de editor que deriva a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é utilizado para editar as propriedades que afetam o comportamento de um associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Tal como existem orientado para a ferramenta de zonas no conjunto de controlo de peças Web (para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Descrição geral de classe), existem controlos de peça orientado para a ferramenta (partes de ferramenta) e cada parte da ferramenta tem de residir num determinado tipo de zona de ferramenta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Partes de ferramenta no conjunto de controlo de peças Web tem duas características distintivo:-são controlos de programa auxiliar que permitem que os utilizadores finais personalizar controlos numa página de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -São visíveis apenas em determinados modos de apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de BehaviorEditorPart é uma parte de ferramenta que fica visível apenas quando uma página de peças Web está em modo de edição e quando específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de BehaviorEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: O controlo não é apresentado na página em determinadas condições.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>valor da propriedade no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo a ser editado é `true`e a página se encontra no âmbito de personalização de utilizador (que é a predefinição), o controlo não é apresentado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the BehaviorEditorPart control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application).
trans-unit.target: Para o controlo de BehaviorEditorPart a apresentar neste cenário, normalmente, terá de seguir dois passos:-adicionar uma entrada ao ficheiro Web. config que proporcione uma permissão de utilizador autorizado para editar páginas Web no âmbito de personalização partilhada (o que significa que as alterações efetuadas pelo utilizador serão visíveis para todos os utilizadores da aplicação).

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Altere programaticamente a página de nível de utilizador para partilhado ao nível do âmbito de personalização em tempo de execução, por exemplo, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to make the BehaviorEditorPart control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como efetuar o controlo de BehaviorEditorPart visíveis numa página, consulte a secção de exemplo deste tópico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre controlos partilhados e o âmbito de personalização, consulte [descrição geral de personalização de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class also has an important method, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: A classe de BehaviorEditorPart também tem um método importante, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, que esta herde do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e substituições.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: O método é essencial porque permite obter os valores de propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar a ser editada e atribuir-lhes para os campos de controlo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the BehaviorEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, o controlo de BehaviorEditorPart deve ser utilizado no formato de persistência de página por declarar um `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento numa página Web.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de BehaviorEditorPart permite aos utilizadores finais editar as seguintes propriedades de IU de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>para editar outras propriedades e o comportamento das <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, pode utilizar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos fornecidos com o conjunto de controlo de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Estes controlos incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos devem fornecer a maioria das funcionalidades de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, mas também pode criar um controlo personalizado editor por herdar da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the BehaviorEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar a acessibilidade, o controlo de BehaviorEditorPart é composto dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the BehaviorEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa o conjunto de controlos utilizados para edição no controlo BehaviorEditorPart relacionado e facilita a navegação separadores entre esses controlos para os agentes de utilizador visual (por exemplo, comum browsers) e os agentes de utilizador e orientado para reconhecimento de voz (por exemplo, o software de leitura de ecrã).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade markup composto por predefinição para este controlo pode não em conformidade com normas de acessibilidade, tais como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 Web conteúdo acessibilidade diretrizes 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controlo, consulte [controlos do ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de BehaviorEditorPart é uma predefinição; não existe nenhum construtor é declarada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>classe e tarefas especiais, por conseguinte, não são executadas quando é criada uma nova instância da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, não é necessário utilizar o construtor, porque pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo a uma página de forma declarativa no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the BehaviorEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se precisar de adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo através de programação, por algum motivo, pode utilizar o construtor de BehaviorEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Guarda os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Objetivo do método é para guardar os valores de um utilizador definiu num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controlo associado é referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo do herdadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir um número de interface de utilizador (IU)-relacionadas com valores de propriedades em associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos valores de propriedade que estão definidas neste método, consulte as observações no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: O método de ApplyChanges é chamado quando o utilizador clica um verbo OK ou um verbo de aplicar a IU de edição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de guardar valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controlar para as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao tentar definir o valor para uma propriedade no associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ID do botão de predefinição no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultButton property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DefaultButton substitui a propriedade de base para definir vários atributos na propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não pode ser utilizada com temas e não pode ser navegado com uma interface de tempo de criação de utilizador (IU).

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é obtido a partir do valor de propriedade de base.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [temas ASP.NET e das máscaras de](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the default button.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID do botão de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um controlo deve ser apresentada quando associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo está em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de apresentação devolve um valor `true`, que significa que o controlo seja apresentado, exceto no caso de um.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>valor da propriedade no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo a ser editado é `true`e a página se encontra no âmbito de personalização de utilizador (que é a predefinição), o controlo não é apresentado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to be displayed for editing, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview and code example.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma explicação sobre os passos necessários e um exemplo de código que mostra como fazer com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo a apresentar para editar, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>exemplo de descrição geral e o código de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controlo de peças Web foi concebido com pressuposto de que partilhados controlos – os controlos que são visíveis para todos os utilizadores – devem estar visíveis para editar o apenas quando uma página se encontra no âmbito de personalização partilhada, que significa que a edição alterações são visíveis para todos os utilizadores.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se o controlo deve ser apresentado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar e atribui-las para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método da classe base, obtém os valores atuais de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar e atualiza os controlos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo com esses valores para um utilizador pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo pode ter sido alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controlo chama o método de SyncChanges, para que os valores existentes no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlo sempre estão sincronizados com os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controlo de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de título é apresentado na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlar quando o controlo está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo está declarado numa página, pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se não fornecer um valor para o título, é utilizado um valor específicas do idioma predefinido para descrever as propriedades que este controlo permite aos utilizadores editar.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que é utilizada como o título do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é um nome de controlo calculada fornecido pelo conjunto de controlo de peças Web.
